amendment.description: Amendment restores the Federal Emergency Management Agency as an entity and maintains its role as the lead agency for the Federal Response Plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 107-615 to restore FEMA as an entity; to ensure that FEMA carries out all of its statutory missions, not just those related to homeland security; and to continue FEMA's role as the lead agency for the Federal Response Plan established under Executive Order 12148 and 12656.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
